About.paragraph: Donahue Electric Inc. is an electrical contracting company that prides itself on Quality, Professionalism, and Responsiveness. Donahue Electric Inc. is a very capable contractor with 40+ years of experience in Residential, Commercial, and Industrial work. We pride ourselves on returning phone calls and messages in a very reasonable time frame regardless of the size of the job.

Services.name: Residential
Services.text:
Service Changes and Upgrades 
 Additions and Remodels 
 Light Fixture / Outlet Changes 
 New Home Construction
